name: HenTris 2: Shemales
description:
HenTris = Hentai + Tetris !!!
In this edition of HenTris you must overcome all homophobia and all kinds of fascism to enjoy delicious images of transsexual love !!!
A game about love, beauty, horniness and desire, against all forms of hate !!!

FEATURES

  • You will be excited and rest easy.
  • Surrounding musics.
  • Increasing difficulty.
  • A new formula for an old acquaintance.
  • 15 levels for you to try to win homophobia and fascism.
  • Where the classic meets the modern.
  • Guaranteed fun.
  • Great satisfaction when you break a part of the censorship.
